pli-tv-kd20:1.1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying in the Sakyan country in the Banyan Tree Monastery at Kapilavatthu.

pli-tv-kd20:1.1.2.pli: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.2.eng: At this time Mahāpajāpati Gotamī went to the Buddha, bowed down to him,

pli-tv-kd20:1.1.3.pli: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—

pli-tv-kd20:1.1.4.pli: “sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.4.eng: “Sir, please allow women to go forth into homelessness on the spiritual path proclaimed by the Buddha.”

pli-tv-kd20:1.1.5.pli: “Alaṃ, gotami, mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.5.eng: “Let it be, Gotami, don’t pursue this idea.”

pli-tv-kd20:1.1.7.pli: tatiyampi kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.7.eng: and a third time she asked

pli-tv-kd20:1.1.8.pli: “sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.

pli-tv-kd20:1.1.9.pli: “Alaṃ, gotami, mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjā”ti.

pli-tv-kd20:1.1.11.pli: “na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti—
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.11.eng: “The Buddha doesn’t allow women to go forth,”

pli-tv-kd20:1.1.12.pli: dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.1.12.eng: and sad and tearful she bowed down, circumambulated him with her right side toward him, and left.

pli-tv-kd20:1.2.1.pli: Atha kho bhagavā kapilavatthusmiṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena vesālī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.1.eng: When the Buddha had stayed at Kapilavatthu for as long as he liked, he set out wandering toward Vesālī.

pli-tv-kd20:1.2.2.pli: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena vesālī tadavasari.

pli-tv-kd20:1.2.3.pli: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.3.eng: he stayed in the hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood.

pli-tv-kd20:1.2.4.pli: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī kese chedāpetvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhiṃ yena vesālī tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.4.eng: In the meantime Mahāpajāpati shaved her hair, put on ocher robes, and set out for Vesālī together with a number of Sakyan women.

pli-tv-kd20:1.2.5.pli: Anupubbena yena vesālī mahāvanaṃ kūṭāgārasālā tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.5.eng: When she eventually arrived, she went to the hall with the peaked roof in the Great Wood.

pli-tv-kd20:1.2.6.pli: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.6.eng: She then stood outside the gatehouse, sad and tearful, covered in dust, her feet swollen.

pli-tv-kd20:1.2.7.pli: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhiṃ dummanaṃ assumukhiṃ rudamānaṃ bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitaṃ.

pli-tv-kd20:1.2.9.pli: “kissa tvaṃ, gotami, sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitā”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.9.eng: “Why are you standing outside the gatehouse like this?”

pli-tv-kd20:1.2.10.pli: “Tathā hi pana, bhante ānanda, na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.10.eng: “Because, Venerable Ānanda, the Buddha doesn’t allow women to go forth.”

pli-tv-kd20:1.2.11.pli: “Tena hi tvaṃ, gotami, muhuttaṃ idheva tāva hohi, yāvāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ yācāmi mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.2.11.eng: “Well then, Gotamī, please wait here for a moment while I ask the Buddha.”

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.1.pli: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.1.eng: Venerable Ānanda went to the Buddha, bowed, sat down,

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.2.pli: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.3.pli: “esā, bhante, mahāpajāpati gotamī sūnehi pādehi rajokiṇṇena gattena dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitā—
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.3.eng: “Sir, Mahāpajāpati Gotamī is standing outside the gatehouse, sad and tearful, covered in dust, her feet swollen.

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.4.pli: ‘na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan’ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.4.eng: She says you won’t allow women to go forth.

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.5.pli: Sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.5.eng: Sir, please allow women to go forth.”

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.6.pli: “Alaṃ, ānanda, mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.6.eng: “Let it be, Ānanda, don’t pursue this idea.”

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.8.pli: tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.8.eng: and a third time he asked

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.9.pli: “sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.10.pli: “Alaṃ, ānanda, mā te rucci mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjā”ti.

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.12.pli: “na bhagavā anujānāti mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ;
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.12.eng: “The Buddha doesn’t allow women to go forth.

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.13.pli: yannūnāhaṃ aññenapi pariyāyena bhagavantaṃ yāceyyaṃ mātugāmassa tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.13.eng: What if I try another approach?”

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.14.pli: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.15.pli: “bhabbo nu kho, bhante, mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā sotāpattiphalaṃ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā sacchikātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.15.eng: “If women were allowed to go forth, would they be capable of realizing the fruit of stream-entry, the fruit of once-returning, the fruit of non-returning, and the fruit of perfection?”

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.16.pli: “Bhabbo, ānanda, mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā sotāpattiphalampi sakadāgāmiphalampi anāgāmiphalampi arahattaphalampi sacchikātun”ti.

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.17.pli: “Sace, bhante, bhabbo mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā sotāpattiphalampi sakadāgāmiphalampi anāgāmiphalampi arahattaphalampi sacchikātuṃ;

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.18.pli: bahūpakārā, bhante, mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavato mātucchā āpādikā, posikā, khīrassa dāyikā, bhagavantaṃ janettiyā kālaṅkatāya thaññaṃ pāyesi;
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.18.eng: and considering that Mahāpajāpati has been very helpful to you—she’s your aunt who nurtured you, brought you up, and breastfed you when your own mother died—

pli-tv-kd20:1.3.19.pli: sādhu, bhante, labheyya mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.3.19.eng: please allow women to go forth.”

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.1.pli: “Sace, ānanda, mahāpajāpati gotamī aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāti, sāvassā.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.1.eng: “Ānanda, if Mahāpajāpati accepts these eight important principles,

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.2.eng: that will be her full ordination:

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.3.pli: Vassasatūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadahupasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.3.eng: A nun who has been fully ordained for a hundred years should bow down to a monk who was given the full ordination on that very day, and she should stand up for him, raise her joined palms to him, and do acts of respect toward him.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.3.comm: “Acts of respect” renders sāmīcikammaṁ. Sp 2.149: sāmīcikammanti maggasampadānabījanapānīyāpucchanādikaṁ anucchavikavattaṁ, “Sāmīcikammaṁ means appropriate duties such as giving way, fanning, offering drinking water, etc.”

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.4.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.4.eng: This principle is to be honored and respected all one’s life, and is not to be breached.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.5.pli: Na bhikkhuniyā abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.5.eng: A nun shouldn’t spend the rainy-season residence in a monastery without monks.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.5.comm: The Pali word behind the translation “monastery” is āvāsa. This refers to the area of the simā, the monastery zone, as established through a legal procedure. This area may be much larger than the space occupied by any actual buildings. See also Bi Pc 56:1.16.1.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.6.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.6.eng: This principle too is to be honored and respected all one’s life, and is not to be breached.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.7.pli: Anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā—
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.7.eng: Every half-month a nun should seek two things from the Sangha of monks:

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.8.eng: asking it about the observance day and going to it for the instruction.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.9.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.9.eng: This principle too is to be honored and respected all one’s life, and is not to be breached.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.10.pli: Vassaṃvuṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.10.eng: A nun who has completed the rainy-season residence should invite correction from both Sanghas in regard to three things:

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.11.pli: diṭṭhena vā, sutena vā, parisaṅkāya vā.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.11.eng: what has been seen, heard, or suspected.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.12.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.12.eng: This principle too is to be honored and respected all one’s life, and is not to be breached.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.13.pli: Garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.13.eng: A nun who has committed a heavy offense must undertake a trial period for a half-month toward both Sanghas.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.13.comm: Heavy offense, garudhamma, here refers to the saṅghādisesa offenses, the offenses entailing suspension. See Bi Ss 13:3.16.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.14.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.14.eng: This principle too is to be honored and respected all one’s life, and is not to be breached.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.15.pli: Dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya ubhatosaṅghe upasampadā pariyesitabbā.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.15.eng: A trainee nun who has trained for two years in the six rules may seek for full ordination in both Sanghas.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.15.comm: See especially Bi Pc 64:1.36.1, but also Bi Pc 67:1.36.1 and Bi Pc 73:1.36.1.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.16.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.16.eng: This principle too is to be honored and respected all one’s life, and is not to be breached.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.17.pli: Na bhikkhuniyā kenaci pariyāyena bhikkhu akkositabbo paribhāsitabbo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.17.eng: A nun may not in any way abuse or revile a monk.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.18.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.18.eng: This principle too is to be honored and respected all one’s life, and is not to be breached.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.19.pli: Ajjatagge ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho, anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.19.eng: From today onwards, nuns may not correct monks, but monks may correct nuns.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.19.comm: “Correct” renders vacanapatha. For the meaning of this word see Bhikkhu Sujato, “Bhikkhuni Vinaya Studies”, pp. 73–76.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.20.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.20.eng: This principle too is to be honored and respected all one’s life, and is not to be breached.

pli-tv-kd20:1.4.21.pli: Sace, ānanda, mahāpajāpati gotamī ime aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāti, sāvassā hotu upasampadā”ti.
pli-tv-kd20:1.4.21.eng: Ānanda, if Mahāpajāpati accepts these eight important principles, that will be her full ordination.”

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.1.pli: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato santike aṭṭha garudhamme uggahetvā yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd20:1.5.1.eng: After learning these eight important principles from the Buddha, Ānanda went to Mahāpajāpati and said,

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.2.pli: “sace kho tvaṃ, gotami, aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇheyyāsi, sāva te bhavissati upasampadā.
pli-tv-kd20:1.5.2.eng: “If you accept eight important principles, Gotami, that will be your full ordination.”

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.3.pli: Vassasatūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadahupasampannassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd20:1.5.3.eng: And he told her the principles.

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.4.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.5.pli: Na bhikkhuniyā abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ.

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.6.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.7.pli: Anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā—

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.9.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.10.pli: Vassaṃvuṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretabbaṃ—

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.11.pli: diṭṭhena vā, sutena vā, parisaṅkāya vā.

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.12.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.13.pli: Garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.14.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.15.pli: Dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya ubhatosaṅghe upasampadā pariyesitabbā.

pli-tv-kd20:1.5.16.pli: Ayampi dhammo sakkatvā garukatvā mānetvā pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīyo.
